mapper.update: update challenge set challenge_name=#{challenge_name}, challenge_cont=#{challenge_cont}, challenge_date=sysdate where challenge_no=#{challenge_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge ( challenge_no, challenge_name, challenge_cont, challenge_image, challenge_date, challenge_start, challenge_end, mem_id ) VALUES ( challenge_seq.NEXTVAL, #{challenge_name}, #{challenge_cont}, 'image.jpg', sysdate, #{challenge_start}, #{challenge_end}, #{mem_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALLLIKE WHERE challenge_no = #{challenge_no}
